1267:3: iha jagati jāgrato jīvalokasya nīlavipulacalacetanīyanicūlanicayādau cakṣuṣo vikṣepādanantaraṃ nīlādisvalakṣaṇaniṣṭho (2)
1267:6: -gā hi paricchedaśaktiḥ samvedanānāmasti cānayornīlabhirbhāsatā nīlanirṇayanibandhanaṃ tenobhayamapi bhayabhraṣṭaṃ nīlameva paricchinattīti sampratyayaḥ sāṃvya-(4)
1267:11: tataḥ paraṃ punarvastu dharmerjātyādibhiryayā buddhayāvasīyate sāpi pratyakṣatvena sammateti vikalpakamadhya(6)
1267:16: kintarhi madhyāvasthālakṣaṇajñānagrāhyākārātsmaraṇābhogādisahitādaniṣṭhitamitīṣṭaṃ nirṇayanibandhanaṃ punaratranetranīlādyarthāpāye'pi nīlākṣismaraṇasaṃkāntanīlādinirbhāsaḥ kutaḥ saṃbobhavīṃta|
1267:21: nīlādyākāraleśo yaḥ sa tasmin kena nirmitaḥ||
1267:28: idaṃ tu vikalpakaṃ nīlādyākṛtisākṣarākāraṃ ca sujñātamantarmātrādipari (4)
1267:30: tena na jātyādiparicchedadarpo dvitīyapratyayasya tatpratyanīkarūpādiḥ rūpatvāt|
1267:31: na hi yatra yasya pratibhāso'saṃbhāvī sa tasya grāhakaḥ pratya-(5)
1267:33: tathe damapi nīlādinirbhāsi na tatsvabhāvaśūnyajātyādisaṃvedi vyavasthāpyamāpadyate|
1267:43: tenedaṃ paraprauḍhaśāstrakṛdbhirapitatpratyayamadhikṛtyocyamānaṃ na mānasasparśiprekṣasya kṣaṇikatvānupapattiścānugata vyavavahārānanyathā siddheḥ śabdaliṅgavikalpāhi sādhāraṇaṃ rūpamanupasthāpayanto na tṛṇakubjīkaraṇe'pi samarthā ityavivādaṃ,
1267:48: tatra na prathama pakṣaḥ taddhi tāvadanubhabādeva tathā vyavasthāpyaṃtasyālīkatvenānullekhāt|
1267:53: nahi śabdaliṅgābhyāmiha mahīdharoddeśe'nagni rna bhavatīti skuraṇamapi tvagnirastī-(4) ti|
1267:55: yasmādiha dharādharaviśmbharāyāṃ vibhāvasurastīti dhanañjayākāradhāritvādvodhasya tena bodhena dhanañjaya evāvabuddhaḥ|
1267:60: tāvattenaivānubhave netyādi bhāṣāmapi tāvadabhyasya nirākāravādinā hi dravyavadekānekavicāracakranikṛttatayā nīlādyākārameva cetaścakramalīkamabhilapyate tadapi na svānubhavaprabhāvādapi tu bādhakabodhādhīnaṃtat|
1267:68: tatrāpyanyāpohe śabdārthena vyāvṛttiranyānya eva vyāvṛttestu vyāvṛttairnivartamānasya tadabhāvaprasaṅgāt|
1267:69: tathā ca (2) pravṛttera pyabhāvaḥ tasmādya eva vyāvṛtta sa eva vyāvṛttaśabdapravṛttibhedaśca rsaketabhedānuvācyabhedo'sti|
1267:71: calanāt, tathā ca vyatirekiṇyā vibhakteraprayogaḥ tasyābhedāśrayatvāt|
1267:74: na vai śabdārtha kācidviṣayasvabhāvāyattā vuttirityato vṛttyabhāvaprasaṃgāt yathā vyatirikte'vyatirikte vā prayoktumiṣyante tathā nirmuktāstamarthamapratibandhena prakāśayanti|
1267:76: tvamityekārthābhidhāne'pi kasyacidviśeṣasya pratyayena virudhyate saṃketabhede vyatiriktārthā vibhaktirarthāntaramivādarśayantī pratibhātyanarthāntare'pi tathā prayoga (6)
1267:78: na tāvat sarvatra bhedaḥ anyatrāpi puruṣa iva tasya pratibandhābhāvāt|
1267:79: yathaikaṃ kvacidekatra cānena khyāpyate tadaviśeṣe'pi gauravādi khyā- (7)
1267:80: -panārthaṃ bahuvacanena prayogābhāvāttu saṃketabhedo na syāt anyasyaiva,
1267:81: tathāhi bhedāntareṇa yadi bhaṇitasyārthaḥ yadāyaṃ pratipattā tadanyavyavacchedabhāvānapekṣaḥ (8)
1267:82: piṇḍaviśeṣe'śvavyavacchedamātraṃ jijñāsate tathābhūtajñāpanāt tathā ca bhedasaṅketena śabdena bodhyate'naśvatvamasyāstīti yadā punarvyavacchedāntaranirāṅkṣyastaṃjñā-(9)
1267:83: -tumicchati tadā'parityakta vyavacchedāntaraṃ tamevāśvaparicchedāntaraṃ tamevāśvaparicchedaṃ tathā prakāśanāya pramucyate anaśvāyamiti|
1267:84: ata eva pūrvatra pratiṣṭhitapadāntaratvācchabdapravṛtterna samānādhikaraṇyaṃ viśeṣyabhāvo vā gotvamasya śuklamiti tanmātraviśeṣeṇa vuddhe stadāśrayabhūtāyā ekatvenāpratibhāsanāt|
1267:86: tathā saṃketavyavahāreṇa saṃketasakalavyacchedadharme vibhāgavat ekasya bahujanena pratibhāsanāt vyavacchedāntarasākāṃkṣatvācca|
1267:89: tasmānna sarvatra dharmadharmivācinoḥ śabdayorvācye'rthe niścayapratyayavirodhatvena kaścidviśeṣaḥ ekastameva pratyāyanapratikṣiptabhedāntaraḥ pratyāyati (3)
1267:92: anyena vā yadi brūyāt bhedo nāsti tato'paraḥ||
1267:93: etāvantameva ca bhedaṃ darśanaṃ śuddhistena....vāde jā-(4)
1267:94: -yeta pācakatvamiti kadā vā pāa iti anyena vā tathābhūtajñāpanāya svayaṃkṛtena samayena na punastathā mūtābhidhānamātreṇārthāntaramevaitadbhavati tathābhūtasyaiva jñā-(5)
1267:97: na pācaka eva atra pākena anya eva kaścitpācako nāmābhidhīyate pāka vicintyate|
1267:98: yat pu-(6)-narasyāmidheyaṃ tat kaścittaṃ taveva pācakatvenāpītyayam|
1267:109: na hi avayavī pratiṣedhasādhāraṇaṃ kvāpi upalabdhaṃ yena tattvābhāve paramāṇuṣu na syāttathā pratighātādayaḥ| atha
1267:113: kevalā avyāhataparasparāntarānupradeśāḥ kathamāvaraṇatvāt jātasya vātra ucyate|
1267:114: asaṃsṛṣṭāḥ kathamavayavinaṃ jāyante saṃsargaśca naikadā tadabhāvāt na sarvātmanā'ṇumātrapiṇḍaprasaṅgāt saṃyogasya padārthāntarasya jananena cet tameva saṃyogaṃ sāntarāḥ kathaṃjayantīti samānaḥ prasaṅgaḥ|
1267:117: atha sāntarā eva saṃyogamavayavinañca janayanti tathā satyavaraṇādikāryamapi kiṃna janayanti|
1267:121: na khalu saṃyogaḥ pratibhāsate saṃyoge vyatiriktaḥ,
1267:122: kevalamasaṃyuktayoḥ sāvasthānopalabhyate tau punarupalabhyete tato'nvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kalpa-(4)
1267:124: apratyakṣeṇa te tathābhūtaṃ sacaivaṃbhūtaṃ jātamiti pratītiḥ|
1267:125: tataḥ saivāvasthā pṛthagbhāvena jñāpyate saṃyoga iti| ataeva|
1267:128: na śabdajñānena vailakṣyamātrādeva padārthabhedo'pitu pratyakṣalakṣaṇajñānabhedāt vikalpi-(6)
1267:129: -kāhi buddhiranādivāsanāsāmarthyādupajāyamānā tathā tathā plavate tato nārthatattvaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate|
1267:130: tathānvayavyatirekeṇa parikalpitaṃ bhedamāśritya saṃyogādibūddhayaḥ tataḥ parikalpitasyaiva cotpādanārthatatvasya kalpitārthabhedastu tīrthyāntaradarśanādapyupajāyate|
1267:134: tato bhinnaśabdaḥ jñānañca vikalpite vastuni vāsanāyā anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ pravartate kiṃ bhūto'sau vikalpo vastu-(9)
1267:136: na vyāvṛttādanyā vyāvṛttiḥ tataḥ sa eva santānāpekṣayā'rthāntarabhedo bhedena pratibhāti vastubhedama-(10)
1267:138: yathā eko guṇaḥ ekaḥ samavāyaścaturviśatiḥ guṇāḥ|
1267:140: sa eva sarvabhāveṣu hetuḥ kinneṣyate tayoḥ||
1267:143: -paṇānusmaraṇagṛhītatvena kṣaṇaṃ tadeva nimittamastu vartamānepi saṃyukto ghaṭa ityādāvapi||
1267:151: nanūpacāro hi nāma mukhyanibandhanaḥ sa kathamasati mukhye bhavet|
1267:154: ṇatve maulī vyavasthitiḥ bhavatastu pūrvapūrvakalpanākṛtaviśeṣaṇayogādabhinnaviśeṣaṇatvenamukhyatvaṃ kvaciditi nopacārasaṃbhavaḥ|
1267:161: askhalan gatipratyayaviṣayo hi mukhyaḥ tadaparastu gauṇa iti kinna paryāpyam|
1267:164: ityabhinnārthatā paryāyatā rūpābhedena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ bhinnaviṣayatve hi tadbhavati na buddhaya evahi sva vāsa-(9)
1267:165: -nānurodhādupajāyamānā bhedābhedasāmānādhikaraṇyādivyavahāramuparacayanti na paryāyatādiprasaṅgaḥ anarthāntaratve'pi dṛśyante aparyāyā akarmmadravyam,
1267:167: tatra kiṃ vyāvṛttibheda eva nibandhanaṃ nāparaḥ pravṛttinimittabhedaḥ gauḥ śuklo gauḥ śabdatvamiti| punaḥ
1267:174: gauriti tadekākāraparāmarśayogī sakala eva padārtha ucyate|
1267:175: śukla iti tadekadeśaḥ parāmarśāntarayoginī ca vartamānā vyatirekaśca anvayavyatire-(4)
1267:177: tatastasya gauḥ śuklo guṇa iti vyatirekavibhaktistadyathā “śilāputrakasya śarīraṃ rāhoḥ śiraḥ”|
1267:178: yadā ca gavākārāvagrahau nāsti śuklatvameva kevalamupalabhya-(5)
1267:180: tadā praśnayati kasyeda śuklatvamiti tadāpūrvadarśanāt avadhṛtagosvabhāvo nirdiśati gauriti tādātmyasambandha evāsya vivakṣito-(6)
1267:182: yadā tu kevalenānena bhavitavyaṃ yadi nāma viśeṣopalakṣaṇamandatā mandalocanānāṃ tathāpi śuklenānena gavānyena bha-(7)
1267:184: kī'yaṃ śuklo gauranyo veti tadā prativacanaṃ gauriti|
1267:200: vastucintā tu lokasya neti bhedo na bādhyate|
1267:202: rūpaṃ rūpasya rūpamiti vat syāt tadvyatiriktasyābhāvāt na|
1267:205: ato na rūpaṃ ghaṭa ityekādhikaraṇā śrutiḥ|
1267:214: kṛtasamaratvaṃ taddhitāt hastitvam atra jātimātramucyate na sambandhaḥ taddhitādabhinnarūpācchuklatvaṃ matvarthīyāntopi prakṛtyā tulyarūpatvāt|
1267:216: kṛdanto'vyabhicaritasambandhaḥ saditi na sattāṃ padārtho vyabhicarati tena sa eva sambandho vācya iti śābdanyāyāt|
1267:217: kathaṃ pācakapācakatvayoreka evārtha iti cet na kriyāsamavāyayornirākṛtatvāt,
1267:225: sa evātadbhedatve samānādhikaraṇyābhāva na hyasatyāṃ vyāptau sāmānādhikaraṇyamasti|
1267:229: jātiśca svarūpañca śabdasya ca upasarjanaṃ dravyamuktaṃ na tadvat ghaṭādibhedastadubhayavyavadhinā ṣāratantryaṃ tataścana ghaṭatvāīnākṣipati|
1267:232: svataḥ yathā rūpaśabdenānākṣiptairmmadhurādibhinnasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ śuklamambumiti tadvat pakṣopavandanaṃ tatpratyākhyātamityācāryavacanai bhāṣyakāra vyākhyāne ca pracarati|
1267:235: na hyaghaṭo nāstītyeva ghaṭārthī pravartate api ghaṭo'stītyādi” yato'ghaṭo nāstītyanyanivṛttirghaṭo vāstīti aghaṭādanyā ihāstīti aghaṭalakṣaṇā-(4)
1267:237: ghaṭākāraghaṭitaghoṣonmīṣitamanīṣāyā eva ghaṭaviśeṣe apratiṣṭhitāyāḥ aghaṭavyāvṛttaghaṭe pravṛttinimittatvena nirūpaṇāt|
1267:239: tena aghaṭasyaiva nivṛttiriti pratītau nāyaṃ doṣa iti cet,
1267:244: tadanupalambharūpatvā diti kathitamevaṃ prathamaṃ bādhakapratyayāduttarasamayasambhavinaḥ punastadalīkatvakalpanamekeṣām|
1267:246: vānyāpoho'nyāpoḍharūpatvādvidhiriti cet na alauṃkapakṣe tadabhāvāt tasya svarūpavidhānavalīkatvaprasaṅgāt|
1267:248: ghaṭasārūpyasphuraṇenāghaṭanivṛttasthūlamūlavastuvidhiravibhūta eva buddhayāpyavasīyate tadūrdhvaṃ dhvaṃsate bādhakāditi ko'parādhaḥ prathamabodhasya prathamabodhāpekṣayā(10)
1267:249: ca idamudīryate tvayā vikalpe svalakṣaṇānārohāditi na saṅgataṃ sajātīyavijātīṃyavyāvṛttapratiṣṭhitaghaṭākārapaṭu pratyakṣāpekṣayā vastu svalakṣaṇamucyate|
1267:250: tadeva vastuvijātīyatvāvṛttamullikhatā vikalpena samārūpyavaśāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamadhyavasāyaṃ vikalpamityucyate-tadapi sthūlamūlasvarūpa [2] sparśādyatiriktajātyādipadārthānupalambhāt,
1267:253: ubhayato vyāvṛttasya hitadekasmādapi tasya vyavacchedo'stīti na hyanīlamutpalaṃ na bhavatīti bhaṇyate|
1267:263: vidhirapi vidhirūpatāyāmavidhi dharmatvaṃ vyavacchinnasvabhāvamapekṣamāṇaḥ kathaṃ [6] na sāpekṣaḥ|
1267:264: “tataḥ pratītāvitaretarāśrayatvamuktaṃ saṅketesañcārya yatparihṛtaṃ jñānaśriyā tadetat grāmyajanadhandhīkaraṇaṃ golakādiṃvat,
1267:265: sthānāntarasañcārān” iti mitrapādān prati upālambho na śakyaḥ vidhisphuraṇasyaiva svīkārāt sa ca vidhiḥ śabdāt pratīyamānaḥ saṃketānusāreṇa pratyetavyaḥ,
1267:266: saṃketaśca nāpratīte'rthe tasmāt [8] saṅkete kathaṃ sañcārya parihṛtaḥ parasparāśrayadoṣaḥ tathā coktam
1267:279: eka pratyavamarśākhye jñāne ekatra hi sthitaḥ||
1267:284: idameva paramasubhāṣitāmṛtamapi ca te sādhūriti piṣṭaṃ piṣyate [3] yatpunaratī(ti)
1267:288: kiñciditi hi vidhyarthī na kiñciditi cālīkārthaḥ|
1267:293: tataśca dvividho vidhiḥ pāramā [5] rthi ko yasyārthasya sannidhānā sannidhānābhyāṃ jñānapratibhāsabhedastatsvalakṣaṇaṃ asādhāraṇaṃ tattvaṃ vastutaḥ tadeva paramārthasat arthakriyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇatvā [6] dvastunaḥ|
1267:295: adhyavaseyaviṣayabhedastu tiryagūrdhvatātmakāni yatropayogā tadrūpaparāvṛ[7] ttaghaṭādisvabhāvaḥ svalakṣaṇamevaikato vyāvṛttamucyate utpalavat|
1267:302: pratyakṣavikalpe ca ghaṭa eva sphurati kevalaṃ ekatra sphuṭatayā anyatrāsphuṭatayā na ca viśeṣaṇabhedena viśeṣyamapi bhidyate|
1267:303: tenobhayathāpi ghaṭa evāyamudayanācāryaḥ dṛśyavikalpyāvarthau ekīkṛtya vyavahārapravṛttiriti vyākhyātarambha alīkānalīkatvādiyathāruci racayanti na vyavahartāraḥ iti puruṣadvayāpekṣayā pi tu jñānasya svākāravaśādgrahaṇaṃ [2] sādhāraṇameva|
1267:304: anyathā hi bādhakapratyayabalāt alīkākāravikalpacalanādeva tathātva kathaṃ sthāpyaṃ tadarthākāratvañca|
1267:306: parastu pāramārthi [3] kaḥ śabdajñānagṛhīto ca iti manyate tena tadabhimānasthalo'yaṃ bādhakāvatāraḥ tadevamubhayato vyāvṛttaghaṭākāraṃ jñānagrāhyaṃ grahaṇamekato vyāvṛttākāraṃ jñānaṃ grahaṇam [4]vyavasāya iti pratītidvayavyavasthā|
1267:308: sa ca vidhirapi pratītyartho [5] pi na sambhavati,
1267:309: vikalpe svalakṣaṇasyānyavyāvṛttatayā saṃsparśāt virodhāt ubhayato vyāvṛttasyāpi ghaṭasya vijātīyavyāvṛttaghaṭamātragrahaṇāt sajātīyabhe-[5]-dagrahaṇa sāmarthyāt|
1267:313: ubhayorāpi grāhakavikalpaāsthākāravilāsāt prakārāntatveṇāprathanām prathamā na rūpasambhavavācyakālpanikasyāpyaṃśa(8)
1267:314: bhāvasyāta eva na mūlo niṣṭhuranyāyakṣaṇaraprahāra pratyāśāparasya|
1267:315: anyopohalakṣaṇaśabdārthe jātidharmmāpi kalpyamānā ekatvanityatva nityatvapratyekaparisamāptatvalakṣaṇā vya-[9]-vatiṣṭhante|
1267:322: yathā tāvadabhedapratyayajananasāmagrī yadutārthamekaṃ śrāvaṇeyaṃ avalokya dvitīyaṃ cākaleyaṃ anyaṃ vā govyaktibhedamavadhārayanna bhinnapratyayavān bhavati ayamapi gaurayamapi gauriti aparāparālokane ca vardhamānā bhinnabuddhitvādvardhamā (2)
1267:323: naṃ sāmānyamāmnāyate abhedaśca gopiṇḍamaṇḍalānāṃ khaṇḍamuṇḍādibhede'pi vijātīyamātrābhinnārthapratīteḥ|
1267:324: padārthānāmeva dharmmaḥ sajātīyādapi viśeṣapratītau bheda pratītiriti vyavahāraḥ samastagopiṇḍamaṇḍalapradhvaṃsābhāvān,
1267:328: tadapekṣayāmi yadamunā pratītaṃ tadātadanyathākartumaśakyaṃ alīkakalpanayā vastupratibaddha(5)
1267:333: sa ca vāstavo'pi samvādāt kālpaniko pi kalpanā buddhau vivartanāt|
1267:336: yathā hi smaraṇamanatītamapi svayamatītatvaṃ smarati tathedamapi āropitastūcyate,
1267:337: yacca padārtho vikalpārūḍhagrāhyākārapratibhāsādgahītaḥ sa āropita ucyate,
1267:338: yathā bāhyārthābhāve'piṃ saṃnidhāne'saṃnidhāne vā śītārthena vahniñcintitastatra vahnirubhayavyāvṛtto nāsti vijātīyavyāvṛttastvāsti cintā sā-(9)
1267:339: -rūpyavaśāt pratītaḥ sa āropita ucyate asatvyāpītyapi bādhakapratyayavaśena tathātvāvasthābhedāgraho'pi vijātīyabhedapratīte sajātīyādbhedagrahaṇasāmarthyam|
1267:353: anyatrāpi pāramārthikabhedapratīto kathamabheda āropyatāmiti cet evaṃ tarhi yasya pratibhāse yannāropyate niyamena tasyaivāprakāśe tadāropyaṃ na tvevannāmamātrakasyātiprasañjakatvāt|
1267:354: ata eva na vyadhikaraṇasyāpi sato'sato vā bhedasyāgrahī'bhedāropopayogīti|
1267:356: kilāropo nāma sādharmyadṛgapekṣaḥ kvaci t kasyacidupacāro rajatasyaiva śuktau vivākṣitaḥ|
1267:359: ryante kimapi bhaviṣyati labdhaṃ tāvat granthakārayaśaḥ ityāśayenābhihitavān|
1267:372: prakārāntaramāśritya syādeveti cet evaṃ tarhi tameva prakārabhedamupādāya vidhivyavasthā yāṃ ko virodhaḥ yena pratibandha siddhayet|
1267:373: “tasya vidhirūpatāyāmastinā kimadhikamupaneyamiti cet niṣedharūpatve'pi kimadhikamapaneyamiti samānam|
1267:374: ata eva sādhāraṇyamiti cet tathāpi kimetadubhayātmakamubhayaparihāro veti aśakyametat|

1267:820: syādekavyavahṛteḥ yato'nyasmādekatvenānye yadyekatvena vyavahartṛ syāttarhi buddhivaikalyasajātīyavyāvṛttivirodhaḥ|
1267:822: vyavahārayati yat yat etat anayā pratītaṃ tadeva tayaikatvenavyavahāryamiti sabalā pravuttiḥ|
1267:845: sambandha bodhiśabdo vā tadvodho vāpi bodhayet|
1267:854: karaṇatve'pi kāryālpā kriyā na dvaya niṣṭhatā|
